channel.title: $250 - I want a Webcam, Wireless Mouse & Keyboard, and (possibly) a Monitor
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,468193.0.html
So I got a $250 Walmart gift card for some work I did over the summer, and I finally decided that I am going to spend it revamping the PC in my room. Yes, [url=http://walmart.com]Walmart[/url] only.
I will show you what I have come up with, but if you find better ones on there I would love to see them.
Webcam: http://www.walmart.com/catalog/product.do?product_id=12575363 Mouse & Keyboard http://www.walmart.com/ip/Logitech-Cordless-Desktop-Keyboard-and-Mouse-EX100-Combo/10975663 (simplistic and cheap) http://www.walmart.com/ip/Microsoft-Wireless-Laser-Desktop-Keyboard-and-Mouse-Combo-6000-v3/10929739 (ergonomic and fancy, more expensive)
The monitor really depends on how expensive the other two items are, but here is what I've found that are in the approximate price range: http://www.walmart.com/ip/HP-HP-2010I/14903828 http://www.walmart.com/ip/AOC-919VWA/11060705 http://www.walmart.com/ip/Acer-V173DJB/14575812 http://www.walmart.com/ip/Acer-V193WEJB/14575816
Suggestions please!

item.title: $250 - I want a Webcam, Wireless Mouse & Keyboard, and (possibly) a Monitor
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I bought the $25 mouse and keyboard, and the webcam. I can purchase $145 more worth of monitor (because of sales tax)

item.title: $250 - I want a Webcam, Wireless Mouse & Keyboard, and (possibly) a Monitor
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:3, topic:372150”]Why 2 threads?[/quote]Because (mostly) no one here visit MITB, and I want some of your opinions too.

[quote=“the elve age, post:2, topic:372150”]Why spend that much on keyboard? Why does it matter?[/quote]There is also a $25 one, but I am on the computer a lot (I take online school) so an ergonomic one might be nice.

Read full topic

So I got a $250 Walmart gift card for some work I did over the summer, and I finally decided that I am going to spend it revamping the PC in my room. Yes, Walmart only.

I will show you what I have come up with, but if you find better ones on there I would love to see them.

http://www.walmart.com/ip/Microsoft-Wireless-Laser-Desktop-Keyboard-and-Mouse-Combo-6000-v3/10929739 (ergonomic and fancy, more expensive)

The monitor really depends on how expensive the other two items are, but here is what I’ve found that are in the approximate price range:
